net.grinder.console.client
Class ConsoleConnectionImplementation

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.console.client.ConsoleConnectionImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConsoleConnection
final class ConsoleConnectionImplementation
extends Object
implements ConsoleConnection

Implementation of ConsoleConnection that uses a BlockingSender to communicate with the console.

Author:
Philip Aston
